page.title: 05Whiteley Village-Attitudes
page.content: When we asked what services the village should provide several people mentioned a laundrette, but they said it was really better to go outside the village for everything else. some residents felt their homes were a bit small, but very few had any complaints. One lady said she wanted a swimming pool and a roller disco, but we knew she was only teasing us. What people liked best about was that it was private and peaceful, with lovely grounds to walk in. They often had pets:- dogs, budgerigars,tortoises etc. But cats were not allowed.
